question: Which Union Ministry has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT) for data sharing?
explanation:
The Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MoMSME) has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT) for sharing of data.
Under the MoU, certain Income-tax Return (ITR) related information will be seamlessly shared by the Income Tax Department to Ministry of MSME. With this data, the Ministry will be able to check and classify the enterprises, as per the MSME category.
